semantic_identifier: 65: feat: Admin UI: Workspace audit log viewer for signal/PII access events (filters, pagination, CSV export)

sections.text:
## Description

Adds an admin-only “Audit logs” page under Workspace Settings to view access audit logs generated by GOLD-55 (read/view/export events).

Implementation details:
- UI: New settings route and page that renders a paginated table of audit log entries (timestamp, actor, action, resource, metadata).
- Filtering: Query-driven filters for time range, actor, action type, and resource; filter state is reflected in the URL and sent to the backend on each fetch.
- Pagination: Cursor/offset-based pagination (matching existing API conventions) with page controls; the table updates based on current filters.
- CSV export: Adds an “Export CSV” action that requests a CSV from the server using the same filter parameters so the downloaded file mirrors the currently filtered result set.
- AuthZ: Enforces workspace admin permissions in both the UI routing layer (hide/deny page) and server endpoints (authorize on list + export) to prevent non-admin access.

User-facing notes:
- Only workspace admins can see the audit log page and perform CSV exports.
- Exported CSV contents match the active filters and include the same columns as the table.

## How Has This Been Tested?

staging
